subNodes.conversationText: [The Exile lies on the ground defeated]
We have defeated Zorn and his minions have fled in fear.
[Just then, Zorn rises to his feet and begins to laugh out loud]
Ha Ha... Fool, did you think you could defeat me? I cannot be killed. The power of the Living Tree now resides in me. I am immortal...
... and I will, shortly, regain my strength and return to destroy all of Charn!
[Suddenly, from almost out of nowhere, Elos The Great Bear appears and stands at your side.]

Enough Zorn, you have been defeated fairly in battle. Now, your actions have sealed your fate. You destroyed The Life Giving Tree. You have attacked my beloved people. Your time here has come to an end. I now banish you to the Dark Island. You will not be allowed to leave that island until I say.
Not until the end of this world, Zorn. Now, off you go.
And for you child.  You have served our people well. Your acts of courage will not be forgotten.
Now, There are many who have been injured.  We must tend to them immediately.
[You and the others tend to the injured]
[Once all have been attended to, Elos speaks again.]
My children, you have suffered much by the hands of Zorn. He will not be returning, but others will rise in his place. We must rebuild and prepare for the future.
Zorn's creatures of evil will regroup and continue to strike. You must be strong and band together. Now, let us begin...

Thanks for playing. Please take the time to rate and leave a review on Google Play (Android) or The Vault (PC). We appreciate your feedback. Thanks again for playing and we hope you enjoyed this short story, slowdive.
